hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Shadow Temple#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Next you'll say:^"Why am I still reading these?"

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Deku Tree#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Green Potion Bottle# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Platform Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: Key-locked in Fire Temple? Maybe Volvagia has your Small Key.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Kakariko Potion Shop#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Ocarina C right Button# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #0# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Shadow Temple# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Hylian Shield#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #3# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Map#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Stick Capacity# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb East Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Din's Fire# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Ruto's Letter# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.
